name: Scary Maze
description: Scary Maze is an exciting horror-action hybrid where you run through a maze killing zombies, ready to eat you as soon as they can.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2GHz or AMD Dual-Core 2GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 400 series or AMD Radeon HD 6000 series, 2GB Video Card (Minimum Shader Model 5.0) DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 600 MB available space
